entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: The Yule Ball is mentioned as an event that has taken place. It is described as a tournament.

entities.name: goblet of fire
entities.description: The Goblet of Fire is mentioned as a tournament that had some issues with it being 'a little unfortunate'.

entities.name: barty crouch
entities.description: Barty Crouch is mentioned as someone who couldn't attend the Yule Ball. Percy says he will be up and about in no time.

entities.name: ali bashir
entities.description: Ali Bashir is mentioned as someone who was caught smuggling flying carpets into the country.

entities.name: transylvanians
entities.description: The Transylvanians are mentioned as a group that Percy is trying to persuade to sign the International Ban on Dueling.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as someone who is taking up the slack for Barty Crouch and dealing with various issues in his absence.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is mentioned as Mr. Bagman, who is talking to Harry about the tournament.

relationships.description: The Goblet of Fire was held after the Yule Ball, as Percy mentions that it 'seems to have gone very smoothly since'.
Ali Bashir is involved with the Transylvanians in smuggling flying carpets into the country.
Percy is replacing Barty Crouch and taking up the slack for him.
Bagman is talking to Harry about the tournament.
